}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This design appears to have been phased out in favor of the LP-9287x models. These models feature a swirly like design with multiple
The [[Infinity IP-0800G]] and [[Tonze UW-6200R/H]] appear to be rebranded LP-9287s.
